summary: Website project with editable business info, including updating the Google Map location and adding a multi-coach 'Meet Our Expert Coaches' section.
architectural_notes: Implement coaches as a repeatable list/collection (supports adding more coaches later) with fields: name, specialties, experience (years).
known_issues: New Google Maps location not yet provided (address or full Maps URL needed to complete map update).

existing_features.title: Update the existing trainer/coaches section (currently implemented in `frontend/src/components/sections/TrainerHighlights.tsx` and rendered on the homepage) to be a multi-coach “Meet Our Expert Coaches” section that displays the user-provided initial 3 coach profiles: (1) Lavesh Kodwani — “Strength, Conditioning, Weight Loss & Nutrition Expert” — “8+ years”; (2) Hemraj Dhakar — “Strength, Weight Loss” — “3+ Years”; (3) Ishika Sahu — “Zumba & Dance Fitness” (no experience provided).

Make the coaches list easy to maintain by centralizing the coaches data in a single, obvious frontend location (for example a config export similar to `MARKETING_CONFIG`) and update the coaches section to consume that data.

Prepare the Google Maps location update by ensuring the embedded map uses `MARKETING_CONFIG.googleMapsEmbedUrl` (already referenced by `frontend/src/components/sections/MapEmbed.tsx`) and document (in code comments) exactly where to paste the new Google Maps embed URL once the user provides it; do not change the current embed URL value until the user supplies the new location URL/address.

When the new Google Maps location details are provided later (either a full Google Maps embed URL or an address), update location-dependent user-facing text and structured data to stay consistent across the site (map embed, contact page SEO text, and JSON-LD geo/address where applicable), using English text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the embedded Google Map location on the site (pending exact new address/URL).
Create a 'Meet Our Expert Coaches' section that supports multiple coaches and add initial 3 profiles (Lavesh Kodwani, Hemraj Dhakar, Ishika Sahu).

projectName: Add multi-coach “Meet Our Expert Coaches” section and prepare Google Map location update
